column5: For those interested but unaware Parks Canada is providing free passes for 2017. You can request them here:  http://www.pc.gc.ca/eng/voyage-travel/admission.aspx
Thanks!
i thought provincial parks were going to free as well? are they not?
Just ordered one and entered the contests.  Looks like a great deal, hope I get to really use it.  Michael
Ontario provincial parks to offer free admission July 17
That's a great deal. Ordered mine.
I ordered 3 for my kids and I, cheers
Too bad it wasn't last summer.. I went to almost a dozen parks Canada locations in Nova Scotia and PEI

Dave you, are not out that much  they will 'us' get using other ways! advertising never gives anything for nothing I know!  I've been here since Canada was 93 and arrived on that date. My family gave everything they could to contribute!  I ordered some so I can give them to my grandkids as a keepsakes as I did with Canada Post centennial stamps and coins that I had a hand in Producing.  I will use what I can! As Canada means a lot to is.

Don't get me wrong I had no issue paying lol in fact I rather enjoyed each and every one I went to except the Citadel fort in Halifax. My oldest has some issues and couldn't handle the muskets and the cannons going off and then lost it seeing the mannequins in the museum lol

Just ordered mine as well!  I've I've fished some lakes in national parks and did alright!  Kind of makes me excited to go do it for free!  Maybe try winter camping.  Although you would need to pay to spend a night..
Ordered mine too!  Thanks for the heads up!
Just ordered one and entered the contests.  Looks like a great deal, hope I get to really use it.  Michael What contests?   I didn't see any when I ordered mine.
Mine already arrived in the mail.
Mine already arrived in the mail. Same here. Got mine last week!
Looks like free lockage pass on the Trent and Rideau systems not available yet. "Coming soon"
Is this a " limited time offer" My brother seems to thinks so and the window may have expired. I just tried and they say there is processing problem.
http://www.cbc.ca/1.2752894
Thanks Dutch
Thanks, entered the contest as well, Guess I'll be going  to Newfoundland, I wish
Tried this morning Still not working
My son registered this morning. No problem
How are you accessing the site? Don't quote me on this but it might use flash and if so you can't use an Apple device...  If you're using a pc, try a different browser maybe.
Thanks Dutch I'll try on the PC
